author: kkolinko
msg: The "proxy.use" flag can now be "on", "yes" or "true", so document "true" as the recommended value.
The property expansion feature for if/unless attributes is since Ant 1.8.0.

author: mduerig
msg: OAK-1806: Benchmark for blob upload and search longevity
Document the scalability suite in the readme. Credits to Ami Jain for the patch

author: arkurth
msg: Updated the section that assembles the sysadmin email message in image.pm::reservation_failed. Added additional information commonly needed to troubleshoot image creation problems such as VM host details.

author: justin
msg: SLING-3707 - comparing redirect against actual content path, not path with jcr:content
